author: wtopstaff
title: Bruins-Coyotes Sums
text:
0 2—3 
First Period_1, Arizona, Doan 1, 2:12. Penalties_Hanzal, Ari (tripping), 6:16; Chara, Bos (slashing), 10:51; McQuaid, Bos (roughing), 14:17. 
Second Period_2, Boston, Randell 2 (Krejci, Krug), 8:42. 3, Boston, Krejci 4 (Krug, Eriksson), 15:19 (pp). Penalties_K.Miller, Bos, major (fighting), 4:35; Vitale, Ari, major (fighting), 4:35; Ekman-Larsson, Ari (roughing), 4:35; Richardson, Ari (closing hand on puck), 14:01; C.Miller, Bos (holding), 15:36; Doan, Ari (slashing), 17:03. 
Third Period_4, Boston, Marchand 1 (Cross, Bergeron), 4:44 (sh). 5, Arizona, Rieder 3 (Doan, Stone), 4:57 (pp). 6, Arizona, Chipchura 1 (Doan, Ekman-Larsson), 7:21. 7, Boston, Bergeron 2 (Spooner, Krejci), 9:10 (pp). 8, Boston, Bergeron 3 (Chara, K.Miller), 18:54 (pp). Penalties_McQuaid, Bos (tripping), 3:15; Hanzal, Ari (slashing), 8:15; Chipchura, Ari (interference), 17:09. 
Shots on Goal_Boston 14-19-10_43. Arizona 6-4-13_23. 
Power-play opportunities_Boston 3 of 6; Arizona 1 of 4. 
Goalies_Boston, Rask 1-3-0 (23 shots-20 saves). Arizona, M.Smith 3-1-0 (43-38). 
A_13,411 (17,125). T_2:35. 
Referees_Tim Peel, Kyle Rehman. Linesmen_Brad Lazarowich, Jay Sharrers. Topics:
